commit message:
Init.d Script: Add a warning when the journal was not affected without errors
The script is able to fail while changing the journal state without the binary returning an error code. We will add a warning for this senario
Init.d Script: Fix 'Arguments to big' busybox error

Translation: Finish translation options
* Rebuild script's log system to use placeholders in order to be able to match MD5sum on the strings
* Rebuild the app's configuration to use the new log file instead of the attention and message prop files
* Remove any static text inside the source codes and move it to the xml files
* Add danish translation files

Replace the internal root class with RootFW
As we now have https://github.com/SpazeDog/rootfw we will be using this in this app instead of the internal one from UtilsHelper
Init.d Script: Replace replaceholders even when there is no data
Init.d Script: Small bug, Check the correct variable
Translations: Do not translate English into English
UtilsHelper: To not crash when translations are missing
